elements.text: You have been dating someone seriously and are looking forward to the possibility of getting married, but you worry about how your marriage might look in 20 years. On a warm April day, they propose to you at your favorite spot downtown. You say yes knowing HD will be something you get through...

elements.name: Spring Proposal_Presymptomatic_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
